name: Wellness Convertible
description: Wellness Group International SA is a science led health and wellness technology business delivering a range of easy to use, high quality, advanced wellness systems for consumers to use at home. Wellness systems are a range of unique, pre mixed cleansing, immuno , detox, health and wellness kits provided alongside lifestyle and wellness programs including yoga, fitness and nutrition support All of these are delivered through Wellness Group’s 100% conversational AI driven , fully communicative platform which provides advanced, personalised recommendations for customers, becoming the world’s first fully qualified, AI Nutritionist and Dietician. A FULL utility token for products and services
